contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 4th day of May, 2005, on certification by the Disciplinary Board that the respondent, JOHN A. EVANS, who was suspended by Order of this Court dated December 22, 2004, for a period of three months, has filed a verified statement showing compliance with all the terms and conditions of the Order of Suspension and Rule 217, Pa. R.D.E., and there being no other outstanding order of suspension or disbarment, JOHN A. EVANS is hereby reinstated to active status, effective immediately.
